repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu:16.04 

MAINTAINER AntSworD <zhengjj.asd@gmail.com> 

# Install necessary packages 
RUN apt-get update && \  
apt-get -y upgrade --fix-missing && \  
apt-get clean && \
 apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install \
automake \
autoconf \
autoconf-archive \
bzip2 \
cmake \
cvs \
emacs24 \
file \
g++ \
gcc \
git \
libtool \
make \
patch \
subversion \
tar \
vim \
wget \
unzip \
curl \
xz-utils && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
